text: is a Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Sasaki was born in Sagamihara on January 12, 1993. After graduating from Musashigaoka College, she joined Vegalta Sendai (later Mynavi Vegalta Sendai) in 2013.Mynavi Vegalta Sendai In 2018, she moved to Urawa Reds.Urawa Reds On June 2, 2016, Sasaki debuted for the Japan national team against United States. She played 8 games for Japan until 2017. ==Statistics== List of match in 2016, 2017 at Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2016 3 0 2017 5 0 Total 8 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * *Japan Football Association Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Mynavi Sendai Ladies players Category:Urawa Red Diamonds Ladies players
title: Mayu Sasaki
